name: HoyTrabajas
long_description:
HoyTrabajas is a platform that provides high-quality, pre-screened, and curated low-skilled talent to businesses in less than 48 hours. 
This service enables companies in Latin America to save more than 60% of their recruitment costs. We launched in October 2020 and currently have a monthly recurring revenue (MRR) of $350k, growing at a rate of +7% month on month.

Our technical co-founders, Rubén, Vladimir, and Sebastián, bring extensive experience from the HR industry. HoyTrabajas is backed by Rebel Fund, Alan Rutledge, Kube Ventures, Flucas VC, Magic Fund, New Ventures, Y Combinator (w22), and others.
one_liner: LinkedIn for low-skilled workers in LATAM
